quote: These boys are boys of ice.
source: All’s Well That Ends Well, Act 2 Scene 3

quote:
The air of paradise did fan the house
And angels officed all
source: All’s Well That Ends Well, Act 3 Scene 2

quote:
I spoke with her but once
And found her wondrous cold
source: All’s Well That Ends Well, Act 3 Scene 6

quote:
I am not a day of season,
For thou mayst see a sunshine and a hail
In me at once...
source: All’s Well That Ends Well, Act 5 Scene 3
